name: Shapes N Holes
description:
Shapes N Holes,

You cant shoot, but everyone hates you and wants to kill you. "What to do?" you ask.

Well, try leading them in a hole, actually, lead them into a black hole to just make things more badass!

Those pesky triangles and thier entitled mother of a hexagon, lead them all into holes!

Once you're done ruining those fiends, find a purple black hole and jump on in. Dont worry, it'll send you somewhere either exactly where you just came from or somewhere a little different.

Links and credits!

Soundtrack and cover photos - my brother Jamie  Sterling

https://soundcloud.com/jamiesterlingofficial

https://www.instagram.com/kamodohop/

Coding and Programming - Blobster Hop

https://www.instagram.com/colossalcalling/

And a big thanks to you for playing and Brackeys for making the game jam in the first place! :D
